vlive.korean: 그게 맞는 명칭이에요 여러분! That's the right way... 듣기 View video AB6IX : ❤🧡
'단장이라는 명칭 맘에 드세요?' "Do you like the name leader?" 듣기 View video Hwang Chi Yeul : #밤황치열시 #part.2 #DJ황치열
신발 명칭을 몰라서 - 알고 보니 안 신고 있는 거 아니야? I don't know the types of the shoes. - Barefoot? 듣기 View video SMTOWN : !t Live(잇라이브) : The 10th MUGI-BOX(뮤기박스) "YURI 유리"
vlive.english: I don't know the types of the shoes. - Barefoot?

vlive.korean: [흉내는 괜히 내서...] 난 이게 명칭인줄 알았지. [The gesture wasn't necessary...] I thought that was the name. 듣기 View video TRENDY TV(트렌디 티비) : [사다드림 시즌2] 고기 한점이라도 먹은 사람은 불러라, 코끼리쏭!_5회
vlive.english: [The gesture wasn't necessary...] I thought that was the name.

vlive.korean: 러쉬 재팬에서는 디바인 라이트라는 명칭으로 팔고 있더라고요. In LUSH Japan, it's sold under the name, Divine Light. 듣기 View video 카모마일T (Chamomile_T) : 일본 러쉬 LUSH 추천템 쇼핑 하울 소개 / 스킨케어부터 향수까지
vlive.english: In LUSH Japan, it's sold under the name, Divine Light.

examples.korean: This area has been christened ‘Britain’s last wilderness’. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 지역에는 ‘영국의 마지막 황야’라는 명칭이 붙여져 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This area has been christened ‘Britain’s last wilderness’. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The collective name for mast, boom and sails on a boat is the ‘rig’. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 배의 돛대, 활대, 돛을 통칭하는 명칭이 ‘범장’이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The collective name for mast, boom and sails on a boat is the ‘rig’. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: These bats are sometimes misleadingly referred to as ‘flying foxes’. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이들 박쥐는 가끔 ‘날아다니는 여우’라고 오해의 소지가 있는 명칭으로 불린다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: These bats are sometimes misleadingly referred to as ‘flying foxes’. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: ‘Villa’ was something of a misnomer; the place was no more than an old farmhouse. 듣기 Add to Wordbook ‘빌라’는 부적절하다 할 수 있는 명칭이었다. 그곳은 낡은 농가에 지나지 않았으니까. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘Villa’ was something of a misnomer; the place was no more than an old farmhouse. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The discussion revolved around the question of changing the club’s name. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 논의는 클럽 명칭 변경 문제 위주로 이뤄졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The discussion revolved around the question of changing the club’s name. Add to Wordbook
